meta.job_title: Manager for Customer Success Renewal Quoting Team

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a team responsible for quote creation and revision to execute on key performance indicators, and implementation of projects supporting customer renewal activities.
Provide support, training, and evaluate improvement opportunities for Renewal Quoting Analysts, and maintain required documentation.
Establish relationships with team leads of adjacent functions, defining roles, responsibilities, and accountability to develop and streamline processes.
Assist with special projects related to the renewal quoting process and function.
Drive effectiveness to reduce overall time spent on renewal quote creation/revision by identifying improvements to the quoting processes and tools.
Ensure achievement of on-time, accurate, and actionable renewal quote creation, revisions, and other key metrics.
Ensure renewal pricing follows current policies, rules, and procedures based on configuration of the offering and instance.
Track renewal quoting activities and evaluate process effectiveness.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree, or 5+ years' experience in an Operations, Product, or Specialists role within a B2B organization.
Experience in Customer Success Operations, Contract Creation or Review, or similar role.
Experience in working with a team to identify process gaps and improvements, and continuously improve business processes.
Prior experience using Salesforce (or similar CRM) required, familiarity with Gainsight, NetSuite, and Walk-Me desirable.
Ability to use basic business tools effectively: e-mail, spreadsheets, business collaboration tools, and file sharing.
Familiarity with CX (industry and technology) is a bonus.
Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred).
